features: ✅【Small Size, Large Capacity, Lightweight】The crossbody bag is lightweight and very durable and sturdy! It's small enough that it doesn't feel like a backpack, but big enough to carry quite a bit. Nylon (outside) + Polyester Fiber (lining). Mens Crossbody Bag Size: 8.6 * 6.7 * 2.3 inch/22*17*6cm（Height * Width * Thickness). Lightweight: 0.2kg. Adjustable and Removable Shoulder Strap: 29.13 inch - 51.57inch.perfect for daily used.

✅【Flexible Storage】- the mini shoulder bags has three small storage compartments to easily storage your documentation and valuables, including one main pouch bags pocket which keeps your personal belongs: wallet, eyeglass holder, keys etc. one interior slot pocket: cell phone pocket compartment or credit card or passport holder layer. there are a front pocket and a back pocket too.

✅【Comfortable & Versatile】 - the cross body bag can be carried over shoulder or cross body. with the adjustable and removable shoulder strap, small messenger bag with compact lightweight single shoulder bag chest bag, there are 3 ways to carry: 1. single shoulder bag for cell phone Ipad mini purse shoulder bag chest, 2. hanged onto a backpack as sub Small messenger bag.

✅【Safe & Lightweight】 - the neck pouch is constructed from ultra lightweight, water-resistant nylon. mini Cross body Bag removable shoulder strap is invaluable for crowded marketplaces, airports, buses, trains, sporting events and music festivals. neck wallet security lightweight and slim shape allows you to wear it freely and close to your chest, let you feel secure in any environment.

✅【Fashion And Casual】 -we will take into account the needs of daily life. we designed this cross body shoulder bag with a exclusive headphone position(cut by yourself) for your modern city life, perfect for listening music you love when you are in commuting or out-door sports to make you freely and relaxed.Any quality problems are found, a free one will be given.And you can contact us to get an help. Don't hesitate, we won't let you down. Our after-sales service is a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for people with mobility issues, perfect size for a man bag.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Our wake up call was standing at the customer service desk at Walmart reporting my husband’s lost wallet. It fell out as he got into one of their electric carts. After losing his wallet, three times and having his phone fall out of his pocket all the time, my husband decided to try a man bag. This fit the Bill perfectly! It’s not too big, the fabric is pliable so that as he’s moving around, he doesn’t notice that he has the bag on. It’s very comfortable to wear. There is plenty of room in the pockets and each will hold quite a few items.He said there are two things he likes the most about it…the top zipper pocket for easy access to his wallet, and the flap pocket on the front where he can put his phone and quickly get to it. Finally, no more scrambling to find his license or insurance card, or rummaging through the car to find a lost phone.He’s a big guy with some mobility issues and often uses a cane or walker, knee, roller or wheelchair. We find that this gives him (both of us) security that his phone and wallet are safe. it may not sound like a big deal, but when you are maneuvering a person with mobility issues, you always have to stop and check to make sure that they haven’t dropped anything.We would highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Practical and affordable
reviews.reviewText: For the price this sling bag was decent for me. Quality overall lacks in certain areas, such as stitching and zipper tabs that will eventually unfurl through time and use. But it will serve its purpose to store whatever items you intend. Spacious main storage with additional front storage. I would only recommend to use as a light everyday carry and not for tradesman carry or heavy work tools carry. Design is efficient for everyday carry of light essential kit. Would recommend if you're looking for an affordable sling pack for light edc.
